titleStmt.title: William Godwin's Diary
titleStmt.author: William Godwin
titleStmt.funder: Leverhulme Foundation and the John Fell OUP Research Fund

publicationStmt.authority: Published by the Godwin Diary Project, University of Oxford

revisionDesc.change: Dr James Cummings generated this file.

div.ab: 3. Sa.
Dine at B. Hollis's , with Disney, Romilly, Adair, Shipley, Garthshore & Felton .

ab.seg: Tea miss Williams's , with major Barry, Jerningham, Kippis, & Mes Piozzi, Weston, Powel & Marriot.

div.ab:
Jan. 11. Su. Dine at Holcroft's
.

13. Tu. Dine at Hollis's , with B. Hollis & Towers: advenæ Barry & Davenport
.

16. F.
Major Barry calls. Limitations on the regent voted 227 to 154{.} Call on Barry
. No. 10. James Street Terrace, nr Buckingham Gate.

19. M.
Mr Hamilton & Willis Webb call. 38. Somerset Street. Power of the Queen voted, 229 to 165.

22. Th. Dine at //
Robinson's , with Warton, White, Kippis, J Aickin & Cal. Jenkins, L. White, Holcroft & Hamilton .

23. F.
Mrs Brooke dies.

ab.seg: Dine at Hamilton's , with Warton, White, Kippis, Holcroft, Robinson, C. J. & L. W.

div.ab: Jan. 25. Su. Dine at Holcroft's , with Luke White & Jenkins .
27. Tu. Dine at Hollis's , with J. Hollis, Anthony & Towers .

29. Th. Dine at B. Hollis's , with Dr Thorkelin (of Iceland), baron Winckelmann, (St Eliz.), Kent, Jennings & Disney .
Franklin is writing a life of himself .

30. F. Call on P. Robinson
,
Barry
&
Holcroft
3. Tu. Session of Parliament opened.

6. F.
J Hollis calls: dine at Hollis's , with Perry, Lindsey, Disney & Kippis : Barry au soir: sup.

8. Su. Dine at Holcroft's
: sup with him at Nicholson's
.
17. Tu. Dine at Hollis's , with Shore, Kippis, Lindsey & Blackburne .
Feb. 22. Su. Dine at Holcroft's , with Fenwick .

ab.emph: Dine at Hollis's , with Shore, Kippis, Lindsey & Blackburne .

div.ab: 25. W. Write to the P. of E .
2. M. Dine at Robinson's , with Hamilton, Nicol & Potts .
3. Tu. Dine at Hollis's , with Price, Kippis, Lindsey, Towers, Davidson : see Barry .

7. Sa. Dine at B. Hollis's , with H. Wilkes, Romilly, Disney, Redmond, Shipley, Thorkelin, Mortimer, Kent, Dn
.

8. Su. Dine at Holcroft's
: see Lisakowi cktz & Coronatzki .
9. M. Dine at Hamilton's , with Holcrofts , Robinson, Nicol & Potts .

10. Tu. Dine at Holcroft's
, read Lettre au Roi par M. de Calonne. King's Commission. Illuminations. Publico.

ab.seg: Tea miss Williams's , with Jerningham, Cha. Moore, Dr Bailey & sisters, Mes. Nichols, Hunter, & Crompton.

div.ab:
16. Tu. Dine at Hollis's , with J. Hollis & Blackburne . Call on Barry
.

19. Th.
Twelfth Night .

Mar. 22. Su. Dine at Holcroft's
.
23. M. Tea miss Williams's , with Cha. Moo.{,} Welby, Darby & mes Marriot, Matthias, Alexander, Moore & Thomas .

24. Tu.
J Hollis, Robinson & Heath call. Talk of Barry .

Mar. 29. Su. Robinson calls. Dine at Holcrofts
: sup with him at Nicholson's
.
31. Tu. Dine at Hollis's , with B. Hollis, Chelsum & Mansel .

ab.emph:
Call at Mrs Webb's and Brand Hollis's
. Dine at Hamilton's with Robinson .

div.ab:
7. M.
Call at Mrs Webb's
&
Brand Hollis's
. Dine at Hamilton's with Robinson {.} Death of the Grand Signr

ab.seg: Dine at Hollis's , with Priestley, Price, Lindsey, Shore, Planta, B. & J. Hollis, & Disney. advenæ Heywood & Barry.

div.ab:
17. Th.
J Hollis calls.
2. Sa.

ab.seg: Dine at B. Hollis's , with Marquetti, Winckelmann, Marriot, Disney, Wodhul, Graham, Roebuck & Felton.

div.ab:
22. Tu. W.
Webb calls.

24. Th.
Royal Procession.

[28 Tue] Call at Mrs Webb's
, see the capt. & Mr Mellish . Dine at Hollis's , with, Lindsey, Planta, Majendie, Mr Blackburne, Spurling, & J Hollis . Barry au soir. sup at
Holcroft's
.

30. Th. Call on miss Williams
&
major Barry
.
May 1. Fr. House of Commons: see drs Moore & Blackburne .

2. Sa. See dr Moore : call at Robinss
.

May 3. Su. Dine at Holcroft's
.

4. M.
Les Etats Généraux
.
5. Tu. Dine at Hollis's , with Towers, Madox, Majendie, & Davidson & J. Hollis . Tea miss Williams's , with Aboyne, Ellison & mes. Barwel, Marriot & Pym .
6. W. See the Exhibitions. Dine at the Hackney dinner London tavern: speak with Hoghton , Barbauld : see Beaufoy .
May 10. Su. Hear bishop Horsley .

11. M.
School for Widows.
13. W. Dine at Robinson's ; give him our account .

15. Fr.
Robinson calls.

16. Sa. Dine at Holcroft's
.

22. Fr.
Robinson calls:
Holcroft sups.
25. M. Meet Fawcet .

26. Tu. Dine at Hollis's , with B. Hollis, Lindsey, Kippis, Stavin & J. Hollis . Barry au soir. Duel of colonel Lenox
.
30. Sa. Dine at B. Hollis's , with Taylor, Geddes, Disney, Romilly, Kent, May Jennings & G. Morgan .

May 31. Su. Dine at Holcroft's : advena J. Aickin
.

3. W.
Holcroft sups.

4. Th.
Dauphin dies. Prince of Wales refuses to dance with Lenox
.

5. Fr.
Grenville Secretary of State. Duke of Clarence's establishment .

8. M. Dine at Robinson's , with Hamilton .
Henry Addington Speaker .
9. Tu. Dine at Hollis's , with Planta, Blackburne & J Hollis .
10. W. Dine at J. Aickin's , with J Bannister, Baddeley & Holcroft .

June 14. Sa.
Dine at Holcroft's
.

June 21. Su. Dine at Holcroft's
.

23. Tu.
Difference of Necker & the King: he proposes to resign . Dine at Hollis's , with the Garbet's
.

27. Sa.
Revolution in France
.

July 1. W.
Holcroft sups.
2. Th. Dine in Billingsgate, with Robinson, L. White, young Paynes & Stirling .

July 5. Su. Dine at Holcroft's
: tea Nicholson's
.

6. M.
Holcroft sups.

11. Sa.
Necker is dismissed .

July 12. Su.
Holcroft sups.

14. Tu. Dine at Hollis's , with Kippis, Disney, Planta, dr Lister & J Hollis . Gov. Ellis au soir. Call on
Holcroft
.

ab.emph: King of France submits to the National Assembly.

div.ab:
July 19. Su. Dine at Holcroft's
, drink tea with him at
Nicholson's
.

20. M.
W. Webb calls.

22. W. Call on Webb
&
Williams
.
24. F. Dine at Hollis's , with Shore, Davidson & J Hollis .
27. M. Dine at Robinson's , with L. White, Archer & Macdonald .

29. W. Tea Mrs Barbauld's
.
31. Fr. Dine at Hollis's , with J H . Tea miss Williams's , with major Barry, Kippis, Towers, Bailey & Bruce .

Aug. 2. Su. Dine at Holcroft's
.

11. M.
W. Webb calls.

12. Tu.
Dine at Hollis , with J Hollis & Towers : Barry au soir.

15. F.
Holcroft sups.

17. Su. 16. Dine at Holcroft's
: tea with him at Nicholson's
. Call on Webb
.

20. Tu. 18.
Holcroft sups.
Aug. 23. Su. Dine at Holcroft's , with Nicholson : Aickin au soir

25. Tu.
Holcroft sups . Dine at Hollis's , with Towers & Davidson .

26. W.
Holcroft sups.

29. Sa. Dine at Robinson's , with Hamilton, & L. White: advenæ Shield & Heath
.

Aug. 30. Su. Dine at Holcroft's
.
Sep. 1. Tu. Dine at Hollis's , with Disney & Towers .

Sep. 13. Su. Dine at Holcroft's
: call with him on
Nicholson
&
Shield
.

14. M. Tea miss Williams's , with mes Weston, Powel; O'B Aboyne, Robertson & dr Bawd .
Parian Chron.

15. Tu. Dine at Hollis's , with Kippis, dr Russel, Thorkelin, Lister & J Hs
.
Sep. 20. Su. Dine at Holcrofts with Nagel .

24. Th.
Cliff, arrest.

25. F. Dine at Hollis's , with Lindsey, Fraser, Montgomery, & J Hollis. advenæ Price & Belcham
.
Sep. 27. Su. Dine at Holcroft's with Nagel .
31. Th. Oct. 1.
2. F. Finish the French history.
10. Sa. Meet W. Webb .

Oct. 11. Su.
Robinson calls. Dine at Holcroft's
: sup with him at Nicholson's
.

Oct. 25. Su. // Dine at Holcroft's
.

3. M. Sup at Holcroft's
.
4. Tu. Dine at Hollis's , with B. & J. Hollis, Lindsey, Disney, Belcham, Thorkelin .

5. W.
Dine with the Revolutionists : see Price, Kippis, Rees, Towers, Lindsey, Disney, Belcham, Forsaith, Morgans, Listers, S. Rogers & B. Wits . Present, earl Stanhope, // Beaufoy, H. Tooke & count Zenobio . see B. Hollis , Jennings , Lofft & Robinson
. sup with Fawcet
.

Nov. 8. Su. Dine at Holcrofts
: elopement de son fils
.
9. M. To Gravesend .
10. Tu. Dine at Robinson's , with Hamilton, Wendeborn, Nicolovius &, Swinney .

11. W. Call on Miller
.

Nov. 15. Su. Dine at Holcroft's
: set out for Deal . Call upon to
Crosdil w. Holcroft .

16. M.
Mort de son fils
.

17. Tu.
Funerailles : to have drank tea with Holcroft at miss Williams's
.

18. W.
J. Hollis & Robinson call.

19. Th. Call on Aickin
&
Shield
.

20. F. Call on Robinson : talk of Mirabeau , Peyssonnel , Rousseau & Holcroft
. Dine at Hollis's , with Lindsey, Homer & J. H.

Nov. 22. Su. Dine at Holcroft's
: Crosdil calls.

23. M. Call on miss Williams
.

27. F. Dine at Holcroft's
: write a paragraph sur son fils
.

Nov. 29. Su.
Holcroft & G. Dyson dine.

Dec. 1. Tu. Dine with Robinson
seul . Undertake Rousseau's Confessions

8. Tu. Dine at Hollis's , with Price, Planta & Shore . Call on miss Wms
.
11. F. Tea miss Williams's , with misses Baileys, Marriot & Moon, Mrs Nichols & dr Moore .

20. Su.
Holcroft dines.
21. M. Tea miss Williams's : with Aboyne, Holcroft & mrs Barwel .

22. Tu. Dine at B. Hollis's : with count Zenobio, Lofft, Romilly & an Amern
. H. Tooke is pro slavery. Ml Mu charged his son £2000 for 3 Lettres de Ct. Dr Price disapproves of Mu's bank.
25. F. Dine at Holcroft's , with Nicholson .

26. Sa.
Holcroft dines. Propose Livy to Robinson .
Mar. Dec. 27. Su. Dine at Nicholson's , with Holcroft .
29. Tu. Agreement of Livy. Dine at Hollis's : with Disney, Towers & Simpson, E. T.

ab.emph: It was in this year that I read & criticised the Simple Story in Ms.
